author: Arman Dris
body:
Q1 c (BB?) 
For the second part of question 1, c we assume that we have one dirty input and one clean input right?

If we were allowed to have two dirty inputs then this seems false. Eg:

Input 1 = [1,1,0]

Input 2 = [1,0,0]

Output 1 (Hi) = [1,1,1]

Output 2 (Lo) = [0,0,0]
